name: Ball Hog
description:
How To Play:

- Keep the orbs in the center circle . The more orbs in the circle the more powerful your gun is! Moving the character into them will pick them up. Drop them off in the center of the circle.  (Gun power is shown by the red bar)

-Shoot enemies to kill them before they attack you. (Health is shown by the green bar)

-Click to shoot

- Move with WASD or Arrow keys

-Survive longer to get a higher score! (Your score is shown at the top of the screen)
